name.str: pair of reinforced chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of reinforced chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards made from the exoskeletons of giant insects.  Durable, and even lighter than standard chitin.

name.str_pl: pairs of XL reinforced chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Durable, and even lighter than standard chitin.  Larger than average.

name.str: pair of XS reinforced chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS reinforced chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards made from the exoskeletons of insects.  Durable, and even lighter than standard chitin.  Smaller than average.

name.str: pair of reinforced biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of reinforced biosilicified chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle. Durable, and even lighter than standard chitin.

name.str: pair of XL reinforced biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XL reinforced biosilicified chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle and sized for the largest of survivors. Durable, and even lighter than standard chitin.

name.str: pair of XS reinforced biosilicified chitin arm guards
name.str_pl: pairs of XS reinforced biosilicified chitin arm guards

description: A pair of arm guards crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle and sized for the smallest of survivors. Durable, and even lighter than standard chitin.
